intro: Lasianthus moralesii, commonly known as the Morales' lasianthus, is a flowering plant native to the Philippines. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its small, clustered flowers that range in color from white to pale yellow. It typically grows in moist, shaded environments within mountainous regions. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a rare and endangered species.
